themes: ineffective communication before and during grant process
complex and confusing grant application steps
delays in disbursement of award funds
difficulty navigating multiple city portals and websites
perceived inequitable distribution of grant funds
key_phrases: Communication prior to grants... needs a BIG overhaul
the city music grant looked like a Big pool of money but didn't seem to serve that many people
steps seem to be long and a bit convoluted
Award money takes a while to be sent through
multiple portals I need to go to along the way
city website is the most unhelpful resource
Streamlining the communication and creating pages/documents with hyper links would be helpful
